attributes.action: Enforce the 5yr residency period for EU migrants when UK leaves EU
attributes.background:
When UK leaves EU the UK government must enforce the 5yr residency period for EU migrants who have lived/worked in UK,
special criteria for doctors/engineers etc as 1000s arriving daily under impression whether 3yrs/3wks here they can stop and live/work here!!
this needs to be clarified now!!

rejection.details:
We're not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. 

If there is a specific change that you would like Parliament to make to immigration law, you could start a new petition about that.
